reviewText: Great film! Gives a great insight on struggles to triumph !

the movie was great, very touching, and gave great insight on how difficulties come about, but there is always room for hope , the movie came third class in a flat envelopm and it was in a plastic dvd wrapping, it was not bootleg, but it looked bootleg in outter appeace, the movie itself was the original, out of all my orders this one arrived last and i ordered everything at once, so when i saw  it , i was happy and worried all at the same time, i would suggest placing the movie in a harder plastic, mine wasn't damage, but it is only a matter of time, with the us mailing system, someone will get a two piece dvd, thanks
